about_the_game:
Treasure hunters of Nahantu will occasionally find dead drops of coin and supplies buried in the deep jungle. Writings inside suggest they were hidden by Spiritborn in the days when the Zakarum fell to Hatred.

Includes:

  • 800 Platinum

  • 5 Nahantu Rebel Weapon Cosmetics - Free bonus items!

    • Nahantu Rebel Axe

    • Nahantu Rebel Kris

    • Nahantu Rebel Spear

    • Nahantu Rebel Glaive*

    • Nahantu Rebel Quarterstaff*

*Diablo® IV: Vessel of Hatred™ required to use these items.

Platinum can be exchanged to customize your in-game experience with purchasable cosmetic items from the Shop, used to unlock access to the premium Battle Pass, and Battle Pass Tier Skips.
detailed_description:
Treasure hunters of Nahantu will occasionally find dead drops of coin and supplies buried in the deep jungle. Writings inside suggest they were hidden by Spiritborn in the days when the Zakarum fell to Hatred.

Includes:

  • 800 Platinum

  • 5 Nahantu Rebel Weapon Cosmetics - Free bonus items!

    • Nahantu Rebel Axe

    • Nahantu Rebel Kris

    • Nahantu Rebel Spear

    • Nahantu Rebel Glaive*

    • Nahantu Rebel Quarterstaff*

*Diablo® IV: Vessel of Hatred™ required to use these items.

Platinum can be exchanged to customize your in-game experience with purchasable cosmetic items from the Shop, used to unlock access to the premium Battle Pass, and Battle Pass Tier Skips.
legal_notice:
Diablo® IV base game required to play. Battle.net® account required. Internet connection required.

For more information, please visit Diablo.com.
